query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `jobExecutions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `jobName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `jobType` enum('scheduled','manual','triggered','webhook') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','running','completed','failed','cancelled','timeout') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `startedAt` timestamp,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  `duration` int,
  `triggeredBy` int,
  `triggerType` enum('cron','manual','api','event') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'cron',
  `successCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `failureCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `skippedCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `processedRecords` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `stackTrace` text,
  `logOutput` text,
  `retryCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `maxRetries` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 3,
  `nextRetryAt` timestamp,
  `metadata` json,
  `performanceMetrics` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`triggeredBy`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX `jobName_idx` (`jobName`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`),
  INDEX `triggeredBy_idx` (`triggeredBy`),
  INDEX `jobType_idx` (`jobType`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `jobExecutions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `jobName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `jobType` enum('scheduled','manual','triggered','webhook') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','running','completed','failed','cancelled','timeout') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `startedAt` timestamp,
  `completedAt` timestamp,
  `duration` int,
  `triggeredBy` int,
  `triggerType` enum('cron','manual','api','event') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'cron',
  `successCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `failureCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `skippedCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `processedRecords` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `stackTrace` text,
  `logOutput` text,
  `retryCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `maxRetries` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 3,
  `nextRetryAt` timestamp,
  `metadata` json,
  `performanceMetrics` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`triggeredBy`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX `jobName_idx` (`jobName`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`),
  INDEX `triggeredBy_idx` (`triggeredBy`),
  INDEX `jobType_idx` (`jobType`)
)
